afk.description: sends an afk message if you get pinged until you write again

birthday.description: save your birthday and I will send a message on your birthday

get.description: Get a list of the next birthdays

target.description: Whose birthday do you want to get? Leave this empty to get the next 10 birthdays.

do_not_hide.description: Don't hide my response to other users

remove.description: Deletes your birthday from the database

getUser.newAge: He/she will turn **{age}** on this day.

toggle.description: toggles the ability to send you user-made dms

target.description: the user you want to toggle; leave this empty to toggle all users ("*").

blacklist.description: lists all users you are currently blocking.

send.description: send a dm to a member of this guild

target.description: the user you want to send a dm to

message.description: the message you want to send, /n for newline

as_mod.description: shows 'a mod of [guild]' instead of your name

toggle.saved:
Your blacklist entry for {user} has been saved.
Now {state} able to send you dms by me.
This will not prevent guild moderators from sending dms to you.
toggle.removed:
Your blacklist entry for {user} has been removed.
You can now receive dms created by {user} from me.

blacklist.notFound: > You are not blocking any users of this guild.
blacklist.embedTitle: Your blacklist for the `/dm send` command
blacklist.embedDescription:
You are blocking the following guild members:
{members}
blacklist.embedFooterText:
run '/dm toggle' without arguments to toggle all users and
run '/dm toggle' with the 'user_to_toggle' argument to toggle a specific user.

send.targetIsMe: I cannot send DMs to myself!
send.permissionDenied: You are not allowed to send dms to that user!
send.asModInfo: Use the `as_mod` option to force the message to send.
send.embedFooterText: If you don't want to receive user-made dms from me, run '/dm toggle' in any guild.

fact.description: get some facts, they're really cool and usefull, rely on me :D

prize.description: The prize you are giving away

channel.description: The channel this giveaway should be created in

reaction.description: The emoji, users have to react with to participate

exempt_members.description: A list of members who are not allowed to participate.

required_roles.description: Only members with one of this roles will be able to participate.

bonus_entries.description: A list of member/role mentions with the amount of bonus entries: eg. @Premium:5 @Normal:2

embed_color.description: The hex color of the embed while the giveaway is running.

embed_color_end.description: The hex color of the embed after the giveaway has ended.

id.description: The id of the giveaway embed
The id of the giveaway embed

add_time.description: The number of time added to the giveaway duration. eg. 2h12min or -1h10min

prize.description: The new prize you are giving away

thumbnail.description: The new thumbnail url to use

image.description: The new image url to use

exempt_members.description: Members who are not allowed to participate

required_roles.description: Only members with one of this roles will be able to participate.

bonus_entries.description: A new list of member/role mentions with the amount of bonus entries: eg. @Premium:5 @Normal:2

id.description: The id of the giveaway embed

giveaway.managerNotFound: This feature is disabled or not registered.
giveaway.notFound: Your provided message id is not a valid giveaway!

giveaway.notHost: You are not the host of this giveaway!
giveaway.dropMessage: Be the first to react with {emoji}!!
giveaway.rerollNoWinner: No valid participators, no new winner(s) can be chosen!

type.description: The type you want to use. Leave this empty to get a list of types.

image.notFound: This is not a valid option.

type.description: The type/tag of the joke (not every API supports this)

max_length.description: the max length of the joke (not every API supports this)

joke.noAPIAvailable: Apparently, there is currently no API available. Please try again later.

filter_nsfw.description: filters all posts tagged as nsfw. Default: true, Enforced on non-nsfw channels

subreddit.description: get one of the top posts of a subreddit
From wich subreddit do you want to get posts? Defaults to a random meme sub.

type.description: The type to sort for. Default: hot

filter_nsfw.description: filters all posts tagged as nsfw. Default: true, Enforced on non-nsfw channels

msg.description: Type your message here, /n for new line

channel.description: The channel the message gets sent to

say.noPerm: You don't have the permission to send messages in that channel!
say.noMsgProvided: You need to provide a message to send!

sleep.description: tells your friends that you are going to sleep

trigger.description: Manage custom responses to message triggers
the text you want the bot to respond to

response.description: the response the bot should send

wildcard.description: look for the trigger anywhere in the message (default: true)

delete.description: Delete a trigger. This is irreversible!

id.description: The trigger id, can be found using "/trigger get". Leave this empty to delete the last one.

clear.description: Delete all triggers. This is irreversible!

confirmation.description: Write "CLEAR ALL" to confirm the deletion of ALL TRIGGERS.

query.description: search for a trigger by its trigger content.

id.description: the trigger id, can be found using "/trigger get"

short.description: return as many triggers as possible

trigger.idNotFound: There is no trigger with that ID!
trigger.deletedOne: Deleted the trigger with the ID `{id}`
trigger.needConfirm: You need to confirm this action by writing `CLEAR ALL` in the confirm option!
trigger.first25: The first 25 triggers. Get more with the `short` option.
